short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically wrap Google Scholar BibTex titles in double brackets to retain title case.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save time by automatically wrapping the title of Google Scholar BibTex references in double brackets which preserves title case in latex documents. This is designed to save you time and reduce bibliography errors with incorrect capitalizations, particularly with acronyms
